name: Common
description: Schema defined here are applied across all SCIM objects and resource types in server

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The unique, permanent ID of the SCIM resource

attributes.name: schemas
attributes.description: The schemas present in the SCIM resource

attributes.name: meta
attributes.description: The meta information about an object such as modification date etc.

subAttributes.name: acis
subAttributes.description: The ACIs that apply to the SCIM resource

subAttributes.name: path
subAttributes.description: The path where an ACI is applied

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: A descriptive name for the access control

subAttributes.name: targetFilter
subAttributes.description: A SCIM filter specifying resources for which the filter is applied to

subAttributes.name: targetAttrs
subAttributes.description: A comma separated list of attributes the rule applies to. - means not allowed, * means all

subAttributes.name: rights
subAttributes.description: A comma delimited list of rights. Must be one or more of: all, add, modify, delete, read, search

subAttributes.name: actors
subAttributes.description: Each value has one of: any, self, role, ref, filter whose parameter specified by = (e.g. role=root)

subAttributes.name: location
subAttributes.description: The permanent externally referenceable URL to this object.

subAttributes.name: created
subAttributes.description: The date the object was created.

subAttributes.name: lastModified
subAttributes.description: The date the object was created.

subAttributes.name: resourceType
subAttributes.description: The name of the ResourceType for the resource

subAttributes.name: version
subAttributes.description: The current ETag version of the resource per (Section 2.3 of[RFC7232]).

attributes.name: externalid
attributes.description: An externally referenceable identifier usable by clients.
